WF_Node.Name: 考勤员填写员工请假信息

WF_LabNote.Name: 请假一天由班组长批示后报考勤统计备案

Sys_MapData.Name: 考勤员填写员工请假信息

Sys_MapAttr.Name: 本月共请假天数
Sys_MapAttr.AutoFullDoc: SELECT ISNULL(SUM(benciqingjiatianshu)+@benciqingjiatianshu,@benciqingjiatianshu) FROM ND1501 WHERE WFState=1 and qingjiaren=@qingjiaren and FK_NY=@FK_NY

Sys_MapAttr.Name: 合计天数
Sys_MapAttr.AutoFullDoc: SELECT ISNULL(SUM(benciqingjiatianshu),0) FROM ND1501 WHERE WFState=1 and qingjiaren=@qingjiaren and FK_NY=@FK_NY

Sys_EnumMain.Name: 请假类型
Sys_EnumMain.CfgVal: @0=事假@1=病假@2=婚嫁@3=产假（陪护假）@4=带薪年假@5=工伤假@6=丧假@7=探亲假@8=其它
